import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { postStudentToDatabase } from "../../services/studentServices" import { fetchGrades } from "../../services/gradeServices" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" export const CreateStudent = ({ user }) => { const [grades, setGrades] = useState([]) const [studentForm, setStudentForm] = useState({}) const navigate = useNavigate() const handleFetchCalls = () => { fetchGrades().then((data) => { setGrades(data) }) } const handleInput = (event) => { const copy = { ...studentForm } const name = event.target.name const value = event.target.value copy[name] = value console.log("copy", copy) setStudentForm(copy) } const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() postStudentToDatabase(studentForm).then(() => { navigate('/students') }) } useEffect(() => { const copy = { ...studentForm } copy.userId = user.id setStudentForm(copy) handleFetchCalls() }, [user]) return (

Add New Student
